==== Agenda - 2007-12-12 ====

* Cool QA stuff happening:
** The <nowiki>[[UbuntuBugDay/20071205|no-package bug-day]]</nowiki> was a smash hit, moving <nowiki>[[http://people.ubuntu.com/~brian/testing_graphs/plots/nopackage-month-open.png|~800 bugs]]</nowiki> from their no-package, New state
** Dapper point release fix verification nearly complete
** <nowiki>[[http://people.ubuntu.com/~liw/lintian/|Lintian]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://people.ubuntu.com/~liw/piuparts/|piuparts]]</nowiki> test results are live.
** Lars attends <nowiki>[[http://wiki.debian.org/DebianQAExtremadura2007|Debian QA meeting]]</nowiki> to build cross-project QA collaboration
** Weekly tracking of <nowiki>[[http://people.ubuntu.com/~ogasawara/hardy-buglist.html|kernel target bugs]]</nowiki> for hardy starts
** Early <nowiki>[[http://qa.ubuntuwire.com/weatherreport/|prototype]]</nowiki> of developer-weather report live
** Steady growth in community participation in bug triage, esp. on the desktop team
** Work continues on the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.stgraber.org/UbuntuQA|QA tracking sites]]</nowiki>, with a major update scheduled for January (Test website now opened)
** Canonical posts <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/employment#UMQAE|job opening for mobile QA engineer]]</nowiki>
* Spec status: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/QATeam/Specs
* QA hardy bug list - we are preparing a list of long-standing and 'popular' bugs for hardy which we will present to the development community shortly

Meeting Log: <nowiki>[[MeetingLogs/QATeam/20071212]]</nowiki>
